pageContent: Sefer HaShmoth Book of the Names Attributed to Master Adam Copyright 2001 W ork of the Chariot All rights reserved The f ollowing is a com plete lis t of the Divine Na mes that were placed one to a page in the origin al W ork of the Chariot Trus t edition of the Sefer HaShmoth published in the early 1970’s. The W oC edition also p resen ted th e Angelic Tree Langu age of W orking and Perfect Trees. The Na mes as they appear below are contained in Appendix A of the book Qabalah : The Myst ical Heritage of the Children of Abraham (W oC, 2001).
